hotels.title: Brand-New Five-Star Six Senses Swiss Ski Escape
hotels.description: Imagine waking up to some of the clearest skies in the world, direct access to the pistes and vibrant village life and awe-inspiring views of the Matterhorn and Mont Blanc: welcome to Six Senses Crans-Montana. Perched on the hillside above the main gondola in Crans, this brand-new lodge promises slope-side seclusion like nowhere else. After days skiing or snowboarding, cozy up under a blanket of stars or by the crackling fire in your luxuriously appointed accommodation, or indulge in locally sourced fare in one of the two restaurants and a bar lounge. Your stay is complete with an impressive open-air cinema, an integrated wellness spa with personalised treatments, a dedicated children's area, and, of course, renowned Six Senses hospitality.

hotels.title: Magical Five-Star Swiss Alps Oasis with Onsite Spa & Three Restaurants
hotels.description: Indulge in a dream escape from reality at this elegant five-star retreat boasting spectacular views of the Swiss Alps. With the closest ski lift only 300 metres away, this hotel is the perfect place for ski lovers and snowboarders alike. Enjoy a Nescens signature massage at the spa or relax by the firepit and look over the highest peaks of the Alps at the Valaisianne Terrace The hotel's restaurants take your taste buds on a journey, with a vast array of options for your palette. Enjoy seasonal produce of local artisans and gourmet flavours at The Lounge, sample Peruvian-Japanese fusion cuisine at La Mu√±a or enjoy live music at The Bar. The heart of the Swiss Alps, Crans-Montana, is just a seven-minute walk away.
